TEXT: TEXT 2,0 "<- CTRL-Click this cube to start the tutorial."
TEXT 2,0 "<- Click this cube to go to the playground."
If you are brand new to Mini-Cubes, this is where to start!
Hold down a Control key (CTRL), position the mouse over the yellow square,
and click the yellow box with the left mouse button.
That'll take you to the first page of the tutorial.
